front.title: Transmission of native IPv6 over Bluetooth (6overBT)

abstract.t: The Bluetooth technology is intended for a wide range of different user devices and will be employed in various devices such as mobile phones, PDAs and notebooks. To enable communication between these devices and the existing IP world, the transmission of IPv4 and IPv6 packets over Bluetooth has already been addressed in the Bluetooth LAN access profile and the Bluetooth PAN profile.
